sourcesContent:
<template>
  <base-card>
    <base-button @click="setSelectedTab('all-bootcamps')" :mode="selectedTab ===">Bootcamps</base-button>
    <base-button @click="setSelectedTab('add-bootcamp')">Add a bootcamp</base-button>
  </base-card>
  <component :is="selectedTab"></component>
</template>

<script>
import AllBootcamps from './AllBootcamps.vue';
import AddBootcamp from './AddBootcamp.vue';

export default {
    components: {
        AllBootcamps,
        AddBootcamp
    },
    data() {
        return {
            selectedTab: ''
        }
    },
    methods: {
        setSelectedTab(tab) {
            this.selectedTab = tab;
        }
    }
}
</script>
